title: Subpart 380-4 - Request for Paid Family Leave, Medical Certification and HIPAA Authorization
content:
Subpart 380-4 - Request for Paid Family Leave, Medical Certification and HIPAA Authorization

State Regulations
§ 380-4.1 - Request for paid family leave and certification, general rule
§ 380-4.2 - Content of medical certification taken because of the serious health condition of a family member
§ 380-4.3 - Certification for leave taken because of a qualifying military exigency
§ 380-4.4 - Proof of eligibility for leave taken to bond with a child

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
